subtitle: Who am I?
content: I'm a Senior Software Development Engineer born in 1982 operating in Ko≈°ice, Slovakia, with two decades of experience in professional IT business but even more years in high-level programming in general. Currently, more than decade focused on JavaScript and its latest features.

subtitle: History
content: My humble beginnigs are dated into late 80s when I was boy who started learning the BASIC on Czechoslovakia produced micro-computer PMD 85. After Velvet Revolution my older brother bought us an amazing ZX-Spectrum+ and my interest in a computers has grown, so in the last years of elementary school I also learned assembly language of Zilog Z80 processor and I've started to do some beginner's experiments in it. Later then I've started with learning of C programming language while I was studying on vocational school focused on electrical engineering. I suppose that all this predestined my career.

subtitle: Career
content: But my first steps into the professional IT were bit tough. I've never been such school-guy so altrough I've made a few humble attempts to study at university I dropped out after year or two because I didn't feel it helped me develop my career. Here you have to understand that I lived in the country of the former Ostblok in the 90s where no one will give you a chance in IT because you didn't study at university. Therefore I started to work as micro-electrician and then I got the opportunity in a design studio where I worked as a DTP graphic designer and set up a web development department here, step by step. This was a spark that ignited my career and it opened the way for me. I changed several jobs and a change came whenever I could fundamentally change technologies or workflows to always learn something new and keep a wide range of my knowledge.
